review_text: Very nice little place above the garage! Great for our short stay.
Stayed overnight to breakup a long trip. It was perfect for our small family of 3 - better than paying the same price or more for a hotel. Jane was very responsive to our questions.

Great place for two and so conveniently located to downtown Newberry. We loved everything about our stay.
Thank you
Cherry
Great stay as always!

The space was perfect! We were visiting for Newberry College Orientation. We were a super short drive to the college. The space was extremely comfortable and clean. Off street parking was a bonus. We had an excellent stay and would love to book again the next time we are in town.
We enjoyed our brief stay. It was very clean and comfortable and was an ideal location! Thank you, Jane!
The place was great. We were in Newberry at the beginning of the week and many places were closed. I would enjoy going back on the weekend and explore the stores and restaurants.

Jane’s apartment was perfectly appointed and very accurately described. The apartment is surprisingly comfortable and spacious inside considering its actual size….my son loved the curved shower! The use of space in the kitchen is well designed and very functional. Jane was extremely responsive to my multiple questions and very pleasant. I would highly recommend both her beautiful apartment and her as a host.
Beautiful little place. Felt very new and clean. Bed was very comfortable. Very peaceful place and area. Easy walk to downtown and short drive to Newberry College.
it was really nice and very good communication from Jane

My husband and I stayed in Jane’s guest house the night after our wedding and it was a phenomenal space! So inviting when from the moment we walked in the door! Jane was quick to respond to every question I had and was so very friendly!
Second time staying at Jane’s Carriage House. Really peaceful, clean and spacious rental right in downtown. And Jane is fantastic!
Great place to stay-especially if you have a student at Newberry College.

Thank you for sharing your home with us Jane, we enjoyed our stay! I wish we could have stayed longer! Jane was excellent with communication, the check in and out process were very easy! The guesthouse was very clean and cozy! I would definitely stay here again.

If you’re looking for a private, cozy location in downtown Newberry, it doesn’t get any better. I was in town visiting family and Jane’s place was the perfect refuge each evening. It’s ideal for someone traveling solo or for a couple. Amenities are great, and several fun restaurants and shops are within a few steps of the place. Highly recommend!
Great place, great location, great host. A short walk to everything downtown. I would definitely stay here again.
Great location to the Newberry College. Very clean. I loved how everything was brand new! Only suggestion would be get a blow dryer for guests to use when they forget theirs😉
The property is lovely! Very clean and has all the conveniences. Comfortable bed and pillows. We felt right at home. Location is convenient to walk to the downtown area of Newberry.
I had a lovely weekend at Jane's! It was very clean and very cozy. I hope to come back for another relaxing stay!
I love Jane's place, it is perfect.

I have stayed in many air bnbs and this was by far one of my favorites. Modern, clean, the whole place smelled fresh! Decor was pleasant and overall ambiance 10/10. Jane was a very responsive host. Upon forgetting a pair of earrings I was able to return later in the day to retrieve them. Would absolutely stay again.

Jane is the best hostess!! This was our second stay here and already have it reserved for our next stay. In the morning, we were in a pinch and needed a couple safety pins. Jane happily helped us with this. She goes above and beyond!!
Nice private place within walking distance of the coffee shop, dining, etc.
Marianna and her place are wonderful! This will definitely be our home away from home while visiting Newberry!
Marianna was wonderful, accommodating, and everything was as expected.
Exceptional space, everything including appliances and furniture was of very high quality. Most importantly the bed was super comfortable.
Marianna was a wonderful host. She’s very responsive and the rental was exactly as advertised- clean, comfortable, quaint, safe and walkable to the Opera House and downtown.
Such a beautiful place. Love the surrounding history. It’s so peaceful and quiet.
5 star stay. Nothing we did not thoroughly enjoy about this place.
A beautiful little gem in Newberry!
A great place to stay. Walkable to downtown and the Opera house. Neat, modern, yet cozy. Thank you, Marianna!

The apartment was as advertised. Very clean with comfortable beds and fluffy towels. The appliances were a little difficult to work. My husband had to read the manual to figure it out. The outside pool area was not as advertised. There are multiple animals roaming the property so it made is difficult to sit outside. If you are not an animal lover this is not the place for you. The host Mariana is friendly and we enjoyed the few times we chatted.
Had a lovely time.
Perfect place to stay. Beautiful, spotless, quiet and exactly as described. Marianna was a wonderful and very responsive host! We hope to stay here again on our next trip to Newberry.
Top 10 place to stay. Very clean. Quiet. Marrianna was the perfect hostess. Blessed to get to meet her. Will definitely stay again, if need arises.
Nicely updated, fresh smelling linens, walking distance to a few restaurants.
super great place to stay, super clean, highly recommend!

From the comfortable bed and linens to the well-appointed custom kitchen, this was a comfortable and relaxing place to stay. We love staying over in Newberry on the way to the beach and will definitely be booking again for our next return!
Very friendly host. Private guest quarters. Very walkable safe location to downtown Newberry.

Very special place! Exquisite home, spotlessly clean! We have been visiting & staying in Newberry for almost 2yrs now & from now on we will only book here. We are thrilled that this is available now. The host has created an unbelievable oasis & has paid great attention to every little detail. There is so much to say about how wonderful she is & the home. Our family greatly enjoyed the beautiful pool as well. Towel warmer is a wonderful luxury!Communication was excellent, she immediately responded. The pull out sofa received approval from our 19 yr old college student. The bed is insanely comfy, husband & I immediately fell asleep. I just can’t say enough, but this gem has everything!! The host is super sweet & truly cares. We asked if she possibly had an item we needed while we were enjoying the pool, within minutes she came outside & ran out to get it!! This is a host who goes above & beyond!! That was just one example! Don’t wait to book your reservation!
I can’t say enough good things about this place. It was so cozy and perfect for the little getaway I needed. I would definitely start again.
Thank you for a beautiful place to stay in Newberry! The pool was lovely. We all enjoyed exploring the town. The Newberry Museum and the Japanese Garden down the street both are impressive.
The place was very nice and clean and the pool was great. Marianna was extremely nice and I would be happy to stay again whenever I’m up that way
Marianna’s place was exactly what we needed and we will definitely use it again. It was well equipped and everything was clean and neat.

There is so much to say about this great little gem, but I hesitate because I'm sure it will become difficult to book once the word is out! Lovely, peaceful, calm vibe. Cozy, well-equipped for any need that arises. Comfortable, homey, squeaky clean. Marianna has thought of everything-and then she provides it. We'll be back
I’m absolutely loved the apartment. I felt right at home!
Great location, clean and up to date. We were impressed by the decor. Loved the historic photos of Newberry.

We were only here for one night but wish we could’ve stayed a week. We hope to come back and enjoy the pool! The towel warmer in the bathroom was my favorite! The bed was extremely comfortable and the house was so cozy and cute. 10/10
Great place with a great location and super clean!!

Highly recommend Marianna’s guest house!We loved staying! Very clean, comfortable and well organized. We loved having a pool to relax in. The kitchen had everything needed to prepare meals. There were lots of thoughtful touches, like bottles of water in the fridge for our use; pool towels available; toothpaste/toothbrushes available in case you forget them; first aid supplies; extra blankets and sheets and a bottle of wine if you like. Our children were very cozy on the couch sofa at night and loved seeing the chickens out back; as well as the 2 outdoor cats that reside there. It felt like home away from home!
And it’s in walking distance to all of downtown Newberry for restaurants, entertainment and such.
We look forward to staying again when back in town.
Excellent for our needs; will return...repeatedly.
All I can say is beautiful, clean and everything was just perfect. Me and my family was so pleased!
Great stay, no issues, will stay again when back in the area!
Excellent stay. As advertised

Lovely and pristine home. Easy to find, very close to downtown Newberry. Kitchen and both bathrooms were beautifully done. Every room was spotless, Anquinette had snacks, a couple of candles, and plenty of coffee. We really enjoyed our stay and would love to stay again the next time we are in the area.
This is a great house in central area. Clean and comfortable. The renter was even flexible on our check out time which was very helpful. I would absolutely stay here again.
Tons of room and spotless. Better than advertised. Exceptional value

This is a great house to stay in while visiting Newberry, it had everything we needed!!
Looking forward to staying here again soon!!
This was my second time staying at this home my family and I love it!!!!

This is an incredible property and extremely clean and well maintained. it was well equipped with everything we needed to make our stay enjoyable. I would highly recommend staying at this property if you're looking for a great place to enjoy with family and friends. We will definitely be back. Anquinette is a wonderful host and made sure that every detail was looked after. It was even decorated for Easter!

Very clean and easy to find. It's right off of a busy road, so you do have some traffic noise, but it wouldn't be any different at a hotel. Walking distance from several restaurants. Overall, it's a good value for your money, and I would stay there again.
The home was absolutely gorgeous!!! It was spotless and smelled amazing. Love the decorations for Easter!!! Very peaceful!!

This is our second time staying in this property and we love it!
The house is comfortable, clean and convenient-the perfect home away from home.
Anquinette is very responsive and helpful with anything we need and we always feel right at home.
The kitchen is well appointed, the bedrooms are clean and comfortable, and they always leave extra little touches to make their guests feel welcome.
Thank you again for hosting us-we will be back!
This was the second time we visited and it was just as great! So clean which is very important to me! Everything is done to accommodate. We will always stay here.

This place was excellent! Lots of nice thoughtful touches like snacks, large tvs in each of the three bedrooms, plenty of extra bath towels and good Wi-Fi. . Nice quality bedding and linens, comfy furniture, nicely appointed kitchen and very clear instructions.
Next time we come to Newberry for the Newberry Arts Council SC Clay Conference, we hope to snag these exact accommodations!
So close to downtown, and easily located near shopping, food and activities. Anquinette is a very friendly and responsive host!
Such a lovely and clean place to stay! Much better than the hotels in town and wonderful hosts! I highly recommend anyone coming to visit their student at Newberry to stay here!

This is the place to stay when visiting Newberry, SC! Easy to find, very clean, pristine looking. The host Anquinette was very responsive. It gives home away from home! Definitely a GEM, so 10/10 I highly recommend this home.
2nd Time Back with this Gem, Always feel welcome at the house with all the amenities.

This space is amazing!
You walk in and you have all the comforts of home the second you arrive.
Thoughtful details, snacks provided, Anquinette was extremely responsive and helpful.
We will definitely be back-great job and thank you again for our home away from home when we are in Newberry!
Home was warm and inviting. Very clean. Love the bathrooms and snacks 😋

I'm hesitant to write a review because I want to keep this Modern Gem ALL to myself during my future visits to Newberry. 5 stars across the board: location, ease of check-in, cleanliness, bedding/furniture, host response time and amenities. There's even a whole snack station including coffee. This is place is a great example of how airbnb rentals should be done!!

Very nice home! The bathrooms were beautiful, as was the rest of the house. Had what we needed to cook dinner. Plenty of towels. Kids loved running around and doing cartwheels in the large front yard. Nice back porch to drink coffee in the morning. Quiet neighbors.
My family and I LOVED the stay and looking forward to staying again, THANK YOU SO MUCH
House is beautiful , clean and in a perfect location.
Stayed here with family. It was spacious and cozy all at the same time. Felt like home away from home.

This place was nothing but amazing, very clean and smell so good once you open the door. Beds were very comfortable and the home was decorated beautifully. I most definitely will stay again,it was very peaceful
Wonderful stay…again. Anquinette is a great host. The house is perfect! My daughter especially loves he snacks. We will definitely be back!
Absolutely loved this place. Everything was so nice and neat. Definitely plan on booking again.
This was the perfect house for our visit! Very clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay here again.

Of all the airbnbs I've used, this one was the best. Absolutely gorgeous home. Anquinette was very responsive and accommodating. On a scale of 1 to 10, I give this experience a 20. Thank you, Anquinette. This was our 1st trip as a new, blended family of 4, and we enjoyed it. I'll return to Newberry just to stay here again. Thank you!
Very friendly and responsive.
This was a lovely home, beautifully decorated and immaculate. It was easy to find and had off street parking.
Second time staying at the Gem and per usual, it smelled clean when we entered and the place was immaculate and welcoming. Her communication is always timely. We can't wait to stay again.
The house was perfect! Anquintette was a wonderful host. We loved everything about our stay. We will most definitely be back!

The name says it all. This place truly is a modern gem! The pictures were exact, easy check in, plenty parking and space to out the family. The kitchen is very nice and would be large enough for preparing meals, although we did not cook while there. The bathrooms were nice and clean as well as the bedding. We slept six adults comfortably. The decor is great and you feel at home. We enjoyed a football game and came back here to watch more football on the large TV in the family room. We will definitely stay again!
Great spot! House was clean and exactly as listed. Anquinette was very accommodating. Will stay here again when visiting Newberry!

Anquinette’s was such an amazing host! The house is exactly what was needed for my stay plus some. My and my family felt at home and really enjoying our stay here. I would highly recommend anyone to book. Thank you for everything!
It was better than I even thought! we will definitely come back!
very clean and very close to campus! Felt right at home

It was not only extremely clean and comfortably decorated but there were very nice touches throughout the house, snacks in the kitchen, drinks in the fridge and even bathroom supplies. It was very thoughtful, like you were staying at a friends house.
Aquinette’s place was amazing! Exactly as described. She was a very responsive and friendly host. Would absolutely stay here again!

We had a fantastic stay while visiting Newberry!! Everything you’ll need is provided. The house was spotless and beds were super comfortable. Anquinette has done a wonderful job anticipating what guest might need. She was very quick to respond when we reached out. Would highly recommend!!
Beautiful home! The house is decorated beautifully and the beds are very comfortable!! We felt very at home and welcomed. We will definitely stay here again. Thank you, Anquinette!!

Anquinette's place was extremely nice and peaceful. Great little spot in Newberry with plenty of space and very well furnished. Anquinette was also very helpful, responsive and flexible with us. Definitely would stay again in the future!
Was very nice place looks like a new home I would stay here again in a heart beat.Love the amenities for pets Thanks a bunch

My family and I really enjoyed our visit. the house is spacious and accommodated all my family. It was well stocked with equipment and conveniently located in the middle of town.
I would definitely book this property in the future.

The house is truly a jewel! The house was beautifully decorated & had wonderful amenities! Anquinette was an extremely responsive & gracious host! I highly recommend this home in traveling to Newberry SC. We will certainly stay again when we return.

Anquinette’s property was incredible - Excellent location, private, and cozy. My only wish is that we could have stayed a little longer! As a host, she was also very responsive and flexible for some of our specific accommodations. This is likely the best airbnb home in Newberry!

The host was communicative prior to check in and check out. The home description and pictures accurately described the home and their amenities. We felt right at home and the home was recently renovated with nice upgrades; which made the stay even more pleasurable. The location was located approximately two minutes from Walmart and 15 minutes from our friends family lake house, so our drive was only about 15 minutes from the home. We will rent again when we go visit our friends family. Thank you for an enjoyable stay.

This is by far one of the best Airbnb‘s I’ve experienced. I will not stay anywhere else when I return to Newberry to visit family. The pictures do it no justice. The bathrooms are amazing I could’ve stayed in the shower all day. She was a fantastic host, because I had a few workarounds with my job. She was very gracious and extremely responsive. It’s located right in the middle of everything you could actually walk to get something to eat. I am definitely not a fan of Newberry but this home made it great. Suggested restaurants I would say would be Figaro and The Palm. The next time I come back to visit family, if this spot is not available, I would seriously be heartbroken. She is sure to be a super host real soon.

Everything was as advertised plus additional amenities were supplied so that we did not have to bring anything extra from home. It was perfectly cleaned and ready for respite! Would definitely book again!

This home lives up to its name. My father-in-law and his parents are originally from Newberry, so my husband took his Dad, brother, and aunt to visit their kin. We were so happy to find such a beautiful spot in Newberry. He could not stop raving about how beautiful this home is- -not only on the inside, but on the outside. An eye-catcher as soon as you pull up. They loved having their own bedrooms, and sufficient space. Beautiful and updated furnishings! The photos tell no lie. Once they arrived, their Newberry family came over to visit, and they even remarked how they witnessed the transformation of this home, and all the work put into it! My husband loved all the windows and natural light, as well as the back deck. Our host stocked it with everything needed to feel like your own home, and bonus- - it's literally 5 minutes away from all the eateries and Walmart. I wish I could keep it a secret for our next visit, but you must stay here.
This place was beautiful. Not too far from great food and only a short drive to lake murray. Would definitely book again
Great little cabin. very convenient. Hope to stay there again!
Place was clean and very private and quiet.Parking area was thru the grass behind the she shed. Could use more towels and a hair dryer but next time will bring our own hair dryer.

I had problem checking in because i didn’t read instruction thorough 😅 but Paris was responsive and gave me good instruction on. Room was clean and cute, i was able to walk around barefoot inside and not turn black 😂. Says lot about how clean it is.
The She Shed was very clean and the surroundings were quiet and calm. I felt safe staying by myself. I never saw Lance and Paris but they were responsive to my messages and very friendly.
Spent one night while in Newberry watching my son play ball. Place was perfect and just as described in the ad.

I would take additional towels if planning to stay multiple days. I also think a mini fridge, coffee pot, and microwave would be beneficial.
Overall, great spot and lots of privacy. We will definitely be using them again!
Just what we needed for a quick weekend trip! We like the simplicity of the Airbnb.. it was exactly as described in the listing. Thank you for being great hosts! We really enjoyed your she shed!

Super clean and private space but no kitchen. I like to cook when I’m out of town and I didn’t have have that option. And if I did decide to cook there was no place to clean up my mess. Just not for me.
This place worked perfect for what I needed. Would highly recommend. Only one concern, internet was sketchy. Could use a better connection.
Lovely and quaint. Perfect for a quiet, clean, and cute place to rest your head for a few nights.

Perfect for those traveling on interstate 26 who need a one night stay. It’s easy to find and close to plenty of food options. It’s exceptionally clean and the AC works wonderfully. Paris and Lance were great hosts throughout the process. I highly recommend this Airbnb.
This is a great little space. The bed was comfy and the stay was really nice. There was a note and a treat to welcome us when we got there and we had a great stay! Would stay there again.
Awesome location. The place was simple and clean.

Cute place for an overnight! They have a friendly cat and left some AMAZING homemade popcorn and thoughtful toiletries. Paris and Lance answered all of my questions right away and were extremely friendly and accommodating.
Great host and stay. Everything was perfect except the wifi on the tv was unable to stream anything.

Loved my stay here! The location was easy to find and in a quiet neighborhood. The listing was clean and as described, it had everything needed for a short stay. I recommend and would stay here again.

Cute place. Clean. Responsive hosts. Quiet location. There was delicious complimentary popcorn when I stayed here.
There's no kitchen, which is fine! The listing doesn't claim there is one, but it could be a surprise if you don't read carefully.
Nice place
Great location and very clean. Nicely decorated and very quiet. Hosts were very responsive. it had just what we needed for a short stay.
Lisa was an excellent host! Excellent property, beautiful yard and sitting area outside. Lisa was very nice and extremely accommodating! Will definitely stay here again.

We were in town for our nephew’s graduation from Presbyterian College and this was the perfect location to stay! Very close walk to campus, basically across the street. The place was clean and very well stocked with dishes, crockpot, microwave, air fryer, etc if you wanted to cook. The pool area and backyard is beautiful and very peaceful. We had a busy weekend of graduation activities so we didn’t have time to enjoy the pool but enjoyed sitting poolside. Mr. Kitty is super cute and friendly! We enjoyed visiting outside with him. Lisa has the best book of food and activity recommendations we have ever seen and we’ve stayed in a lot of air bnbs. The towels were new, absorbent and soft and my husband said “these are nicer than our towels at home”! There were fresh flowers in each room and popcorn and instant oatmeal along with coffee and tea. I can’t think of anything she possibly could have done better! Clin’on: where the t is silent but oh so sweet. ❤️

This was a return visit for us because we were so happy with the accommodations in the past. We were not disappointed and will return again when visiting our son and family. It's very quiet and the back yard and pool very private. It is exactly as described and Lisa is so friendly, welcoming and helpful. She gets 5 stars from us :)
We were in town for a PC lacrosse game. We had a great stay at Lisa’s house. The backyard was peaceful & the space was clean and comfortable. We would stay there again!
Lisa’s place was so clean and convenient and Lisa herself was the sweetest!
We always feel at home when staying with Lisa. We’ve stayed with Lisa many times. She is always very accommodating and communication is great.

Lisa was a great host at her College View Cottage & Saltwater Pool location. We were coming down for a recruiting visit to PC for our daughter and we had plenty of flex time to check out the surroundings. Lisa provided us great check in instructions and things to do while we were in Clinton. The accommodations are exactly as they're described. Living area and bedrooms are very spacious and comforting...beds are very nice. The backyard surroundings with the pool, firepit and lounge chairs are a great feature. The fresh fruit was a great touch! We had time to visit the town of Laurens for a great dinner and went to Greenville for a half-day visit. Clinton is a small town who takes pride in their community and of course the PC Blue Hose! Can't wait to visit Lisa and her place again!

Lisa’s Airbnb is one of the nicest (if not THE nicest) at which I have stayed. Located in a lovely neighborhood, it’s spacious and bright, spotlessly clean, comfortably and stylishly furnished, and thoughtfully stocked with everything to make guests feel at home. The beds are super comfortable with quality linens and pillows.
Lisa was a wonderful host, greeting us upon arrival and at departure, taking a genuine interest in us. Communication was excellent throughout. We look forward to staying with Lisa again!

Lisa’s apartment is the nicest we’ve ever stayed in. Everything was perfect. Easy walk to campus and downtown.
Lisa was the perfect host!
Lisa was a wonderful host and her place felt like a home away from home. Very thoughtful about details and personal touches. We had everything we needed and had a terrific stay!

We had great time at Lisa’s place! It has everything you need and is filled with little touches that make you feel at home. Lisa is a wonderful host and greeted us with kindness as we arrived. Would strongly recommend staying here!

We loved Lisa's guest suite. It was clean and so cozy. The work area was nice, WiFi worked great. We relaxed on the couch and enjoyed the soft blankets while watching movies. The bed was very comfortable and we slept well. The shower has great water pressure and the bathroom amenities -including a flat iron-were nice. I was visiting my daughter, a student at PC, and loved that Lisa has a washer and dryer where I could help my daughter get laundry done without having to deal with the communal dorm washer. The house is conveniently located so close to PC which is perfect for my trip's purpose. Lisa reached out about our arrival time and made sure to leave a lighted walkway to the suite and inside lights for us since we arrived late night. The carport parking space is also very nice! Lisa is very friendly and loves hosting. She is so easy to communicate with and I look forward to my next stay!

Love, love, love staying at Lisa's place. We have stayed here several times and always look forward to coming back to this area. Lisa is so accommodating, friendly, and I have thoroughly enjoyed getting to know her. She has added a washer and dryer since our last visit and that was a big plus. She goes out of her way to ensure that her guests have the best experience possible and that makes her a super host!
We love staying at Lisa’s place. It’s well stocked, super clean, walkable to PC. It has absolutely everything you would need in an extremely comfortable living area!
Beautiful facility with a knowledgeable friendly hostess. Everything was there that we wanted or needed.

Lisa was the perfect hostess! The house was amazing and in a beautiful setting. It was perfect for our visit and so close to campus! Would definitely recommend a stay here and if we ever need to be back that way we will absolutely check for availability at Lisa’s!!
super cute place with some personal touches like fresh cookies left for us! 🍪🫶 would definitely recommend staying here I'm sure the pool is great too!

Lisa is a wonderful host and super helpful and responsive
She made us feel very welcome
The house is great and equipped with everything you need
We had a wonderful stay and highly recommend Lisa”s place:)
I've stayed here before and will stay here again! Great property.

This was 100% everything we needed, wanted, expected. The space was perfect for our needs as we visited Clinton to spend some holiday time with our son and his family.
Lisa was excellent to work with, and she paid attention to all of the little details that made this such a great place to stay. We have already inquired about returning again to stay with her. U will not be disappointed in choosing this for your Clinton area visit :) We were so very pleased with our time there and our accommodations!
Solid place to stay; honestly wish we’d spent more time there
Lisa is so kind and a great communicator! Beautiful and cozy place!

A very big thank you to our host Lisa. We arrived after dark and found Lisa's instructions so very helpful. She is a wonderful host and very responsive to the messages prior to our stay. Lisa's hospitality is wonderful. She treated us with salted caramel chocolates and chocolate covered cashews. We loved the fresh fruit too. The coffee and tea was laid out in an inviting manner. Our beds were very comfortable and the living space was beautifully decorated and made us feel at home. I would definitely book Lisa' place again if I'm in South Carolina.

This place was great! Exactly what I needed for one night. Both bedrooms were really nice and big bathroom. Lots of great amenities. Lisa was a wonderful host Would definitely stay again. The chocolates were great!!
One of the best airbnbs I’ve ever stayed at and hands down one of the best host I’ve ever had. Definitely recommend this place to anyone, it’s definitely worth it !

This was the first time ever staying in and Air B&B and Lisa made it so easy! Her home was drop dead gorgeous! Every little detail was perfect, right down to the fresh fruit on the table and the keurig coffee make and coffee on the counter. The home was in a beautiful quiet neighborhood within easy walking distance to the Presbyterian College for a stroll through the campus. We are already planning our next stay with her.

We could not have felt more welcomed for homecoming weekend at PC! Lisa was so friendly, responsive, and helpful. The space was large, had plenty of clean linens and thoughtful gestures. We look forward to returning one day soon!

Lisa's attention to detail is exceptional! From the warm and inviting decor, to the personal welcome, treats and amenities, I can't say enough about how relaxed her space made me feel. Don't miss out on this opportunity. I am already looking forward to my next trip!
We really enjoyed staying at Lisa’s place. Peaceful and quiet location in walkable neighborhood. Will happily stay again.
Great house, nice pool. Very comfortable
As always, Lisa was a wonderful, generous and gracious host. The Airbnb was clean, comfortable and suited our needs. We love staying at Lisa's when we're in the area.

Lisa and her place were great! The pool was fabulous, and had chairs, floats, grills, nice tables, etc. The apt. was spacious, clean, and had all the amenities for what is described. You can tell Lisa is not new to this, and is always looking for the extra upgrades she can do. It is one of the many reasons to look for that Super host sign. We enjoyed talking to her, but she left us our privacy as well.
Lisa is a delightful host. Her place is wonderful, quiet and feels secluded. The apartment is well supplied for an easy stay. We will definitely be staying with Lisa again!
Very nice stay,will be back!
Lisa was great host. Very responsive too any questions or issues. She had lots of special touches
Lisa is an excellent host. This is our second time visiting the area and we plan on coming back next year. So peaceful, clean and comfortable. Lisa thinks of everything.
Always enjoy staying at Lisa’s place and getting to visit with her is an added bonus! She is Super Host!

Lisa is simply amazing!! Our stay was perfect and we got such a great deal. Very thankful for Lisa opening up her Airbnb home and lovely backyard/pool for us to feel at home. I stayed with my son who was attending a camp at the nearby Presbyterian College. He went running in the mornings and felt safe in the quiet neighborhood. We did not hear anything while in the home-very quiet and calm vibes. If you’re looking for a place in Clinton, wait no more and book this home-you will be treated like family (or better 😉). Thank you, Lisa!!!

This was one of our favorite stays through Airbnb! You feel at home when you're staying here. It's peaceful, quiet and very relaxing. Lisa has everything you could possibly need and more. Everything was pristine including the pool! If you are ever in Clinton, it's a must stay!
This is the second time I've stayed at Lisa's place and it was perfect, again! The pool, air conditioning, great couch, overall amazing. I would definitely stay again.

Lisa’s place is beautiful and very comfortable! The decor is nice and she’s thought of everything you might need. It’s convenient to everything in Clinton. Since it was raining, we really appreciated the covered parking.
I can’t remember if the description mentions it, but know that there are some steps going into the apartment. Just double check with Lisa that it will work for you, if that is a potential issue.
We enjoyed our stay and hope we can stay there again sometime.
We’ve stayed with Lisa several times and she’s the perfect host. We love staying here.
